statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, password, security_key FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE security_key = 'abc123';
SELECT username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user_authentication WHERE password = 'hashed_password' OR security_key = '12345';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE password_hash = 'hashed_password';
SELECT user_id, security_key FROM user_credentials WHERE security_key LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM wallet_access WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, security_key FROM user_credentials WHERE password_hash = 'password123';
SELECT DISTINCT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials;
SELECT user_id, wallet_address, access_level FROM wallet_access WHERE access_level >= 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_address FROM wallet_access WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%0' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, security_key FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM wallet_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN wallet_transactions ON users.user_id = wallet_transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, security_key, expiration_date FROM security_keys WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 3;
SELECT u.username, w.balance, s.login_time FROM users u JOIN wallet w ON u.user_id = w.user_id JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id ORDER BY s.login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND password = 'admin@123';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';

SELECT urm.mapping_id, ur.username, upm.permission_id FROM user_role_mapping urm JOIN users ur ON urm.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN user_permission_mapping upm ON urm.user_id = upm.user_id WHERE urm.role_id = 1;
